profile:
Since 2007, J and J Coatings has been providing expert parging services in Edmonton and the surrounding area. 

Our parging services can improve the appearance of your home, but more importantly, we help shield your foundation, arguably the most important part of the house, from elements like snow, water and ice that are a fact of life in our harsh Alberta climate. 

Whether you need repairs to existing parging or a fresh, new application, weâ€™re the parging experts you need to work with to ensure your job is a success story. 

Your 100% satisfaction is our goal. Get started with a complimentary, no-obligation quote from J and J Coatings. Contact us today for your Parging needs!
service_area: Based in Edmonton, Alberta, we also serve Sherwood Park, Saint Albert, Fort Saskatchewan, Beaumont, Devon, Spruce Grove, Morinville, Leduc, Bon Accord, Stony Plain, Gibbons and Calmar.
services:
We specialize in parging. Whether it is a small repair or a new build you can count on J and J Coatings. We can apply a sand and cement parging coat over a variety of surfaces, poured or block concrete, brick, ICF or wood foundations and rigid styrofoam.

We can repair leaking basement windows by removing the existing parging, ensuring the window is installed properly and installing a weather membrane or elastomeric copolymer sealant and re-parging.
name: J And J Coatings - Parging Experts

profile:
Perennial Masonry And Construction Inc. is a team of experts with decades of experience in the construction industry. We draw on long years of experience to provide top quality projects that will last a lifetime for you. All Perennial employees are fully trained and certified so you can be confident that you are hiring the best. We dont cut any corners on our work or with our customers. You can be assured of excellence and quality throughout your entire project.
We are a team of experienced service professionals, specializing in brick, stone, tile, block, landscaping and concrete work.
